abstract: Wide receiver Nathan Slaughter signs with Arizona Cardinals following NFL veterans combine.
lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Nathan Slaughter became the first success story from the N.F.L. veterans combine, signing with the Arizona Cardinals on Monday.

headline.main: Veterans Combine Leads to a Signing
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Success at Veterans Combine

snippet: Wide receiver Nathan Slaughter became the first success story from the N.F.L. veterans combine, signing with the Arizona Cardinals on Monday.
